description.en:
Released in 2006 to celebrate Kochikame's 30th Anniversary, this special edition volume contains several pages of information and pictures related to Kochikame and the series' history.  
The volume also contains many one-page crossover illustrations from other authors, sit-down discussions with the author of Kochikame, and 5 crossover chapters with other famous manga series.  
  
Contents:  
  
- **Opening Pages**  
  
  - Osamu Akimoto 2006 Drawing, "Ryoutsu Kankichi 1976 x 2006" (pg 003-005)  
  - 30th Anniversary Commemorative Pin-up, "KOCHIKAME all in one" (pg 006-008)
- "A Greeting from Ryoutsu Kankichi" (pg 009)  
- **"Super Kochikame Special" by Osamu Akimoto (pg 010-017)**  
- "Kochikame Landmarks" with photography by Mitsugu Oonishi (pg 018-024)  
- "1976-2006 30 Years of Ryoutsu Kankichi and Japan" (pg 025-041)  

- **Super Collaboration Project #1
Kochira Katsushikaku Kameari Kouenmae Hashutsujo × Golgo 13 "Holiday Runner"**
***by Osamu Akimoto & Takao Saito*** (pg 042-055)
- "Kochikame Main Characters' 30-Year Evolutions!!" 
	  
	* Ryoutsu Kankichi (pg 056-061)  
	* Nakagawa Keiichi (pg 062-067)  
	* Akimoto Reiko (pg 068-073)  
	* Chief Ohara (pg 074-079)  
- *"Kochikame Characters in Another World ①" (a collection of one-page guest illustrations)*
	- *AIHARA Koji [Koujien]* (pg 081)  
	- *AMANO Akira [[Kateikyoushi Hitman Reborn!](https://mangadex.org/manga/109)]* (pg 082)  
	- *AMANO Kozue [[Aria](https://mangadex.org/manga/2007)]* (pg 083)  
	- *AMANO Youichi [[Over Time](https://mangadex.org/manga/633)]* (pg 084)  
	- *ARAKAWA Hiromu [[Fullmetal Alchemist](https://mangadex.org/manga/286)]* (pg 085)  
	- *ARAKI Hirohiko [[Steel Ball Run](https://mangadex.org/manga/6272)]* (pg 086)  
	- *ARO Hiroshi [Boku no Shachou-sama]* (pg 087)  
	- *IKEZAWA Satoshi [The Circuit Wolf]* (pg 088)  
	- *ICHIJO Yukari [[Yukan Club](https://mangadex.org/manga/4872)]* (pg 089)  
	- *IPPONGI Bang [Tatakae Okusan!! Funinshou Bugi]* (pg 090)  
	- *ITOU Mikio [[Nazo no Murasame-kun](https://mangadex.org/manga/5218)]* (pg 091)  
	- *INAGAKI Riichirou & MURATA Yuusuke [[Eyeshield 21](https://mangadex.org/manga/883)]* (pg 092)  
	- *INOUE Takehiko [[Slam Dunk](https://mangadex.org/manga/3943)]* (pg 093)  
	- *IWASHIRO Toshiaki [[Mieru Hito](https://mangadex.org/manga/7328)]* (pg 094)  
	- *USUI Yoshito [[Crayon Shin-chan](https://mangadex.org/manga/10200)]* (pg 095)  
	- *USUTA Kyousuke [[Pyu to Fuku! Jaguar](https://mangadex.org/manga/2999)]* (pg 096)  
	- *USUNE Masatoshi [[Desert Punk](https://mangadex.org/manga/1135)]* (pg 097)  
	- *UMEZAWA Haruto [[BØY](https://mangadex.org/manga/185)] [[Countach](https://mangadex.com/manga/1711)]* (pg 098)  
	- *EGUCHI Hisashi [Chara Mono]* (pg 099)  
	- *OOISHI Kouji [Maison du Penguin]* (pg 100)  
	- *OOGURE Ito [[Tenjou Tenge](https://mangadex.org/manga/5776)]* (pg 101)

- "Kochikame 30th Anniversary Commemorative Discussion!! Osamu Akimoto x Rokusuke Ei" (pg 102-109)  
- "Exploring the Downtown Setting" (pg 110-119) 

- **Super Collaboration Project #2  
Kochira Katsushikaku Kouenmae Hashutsujo x Lupin III "Kankichi Ryotsu VS Lupin III"** 
***by Osamu Akimoto & Monkey Punch*** (pg 120-133)  

- A Thorough Examination of the Series' Style "The Evolution of Kochikame's Humor" (pg 134-145)  

- *"Kochikame Characters in Another World ②" (a collection of one-page guest illustrations)*  
	* *OOBA Tsugumi & OBATA Takeshi [[Death Note](https://mangadex.org/manga/82)]* (pg 147)  
	* *OKANO Takeshi [[Hell Teacher Nube](https://mangadex.org/manga/223)]* (pg 148)

	* *KONOMI Takeshi [[Prince of Tennis](https://mangadex.org/manga/2475)]* (pg 159)  
	* *KOBAYASHI Yoshinori [Obocchama-kun]* (pg 160)  
	* *KON Tarou [[1-2 no Ahho!!](https://mangadex.org/title/77c1f6fb-3c4c-47d3-a939-f5648e9b6e91/)]* (pg 161)  
	* *SATONAKA Machiko [[Tenjou no Niji](https://mangadex.org/title/1bc7a5fe-5c4b-4410-a309-65e8ef62ff81/)]* (pg 162)  
	* *SAWAI Yoshio [[Shinsetsu Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo](https://mangadex.org/manga/6218)]* (pg 163)  
	* *SANJOU Riku & INADA Kouji [[Beet the Vandel Buster](https://mangadex.org/manga/18783)]* (pg 164)  
	* *SHIMABUKURO Mitsutoshi [[Seikimatsu Leader Den Takeshi!](https://mangadex.org/manga/20235)]* (pg 165)  
	* *SUGITA Naoya [[Zan](https://mangadex.org/manga/5837)]* (pg 166)  
	* *SUZUKI Shinya [[Mr. Fullswing](https://mangadex.org/manga/230)]* (pg 167)  

- "Kochikame 30th Anniversary Commemorative Discussion!! Osamu Akimoto x Arimasa Osawa" (pg 168-175)  

* **Super Collaboration Project #3  
Kochira Katsushikaku Kameari Kouenmae Hashutsujo×Kinnikuman "Great Gathering of Justice Heroes in Kameari!!"**
***by Osamu Akimoto & Yudetamago*** (pg 176-190)  

- "Kochikame 30th Anniversary Commemorative Round-table Discussion: Comrades Chat with Osamu Akimoto and Jump!"  
Satoshi Ikezawa x Shinji Hiramatsu x Hisashi Eguchi x Osamu Akimoto (pg 191-203)  
- "Strolling through 40 years of Kochikame and Jump!! Kochikame in Jump Land" (pg 204-209)  
- "Exploring 30 years of Character's prosperity! The Rise and Fall of Sub-Characters" (pg 210-217)
  
* **Super Collaboration Project #4  
Kochira Katsushikaku Kameari Kouenmae Hashutsujo×DRAGON BALL "This is the Police Station in Front of Dragon Park on Planet Namek"**
***by Osamu Akimoto & Akira Toriyama*** (pg 218-227)  

- *"Kochikame Characters in Another World ③" (a collection of one-page guest illustrations)*  

	  
	* *SOYAMA Kazutoshi [[Zettaizetsumei Dangerous Jiisan](https://mangadex.org/manga/8106)]* (pg 229)  
	* *SORACHI Hideaki [[Gintama](https://mangadex.org/manga/94)]* (pg 230)  
	* *DAI Amon [Taizou Mote King Saga]* (pg 231)  
	* *TAKAHASHI Kazuki [[Yu✩Gi✩Oh](https://mangadex.org/manga/7915)]* (pg 232)  
	* *TAKAHASHI Yoichi [[Captain Tsubasa](https://mangadex.org/title/855/)]* (pg 233)  
	* *TAKAHASHI Yoshihiro [[Ginga: Nagareboshi Gin](https://mangadex.org/manga/10930)]* (pg 234)  
	* *TAKEI Hiroyuki [Smash Bomber]* (pg 235)  
	* *CHIBA Tetsuya [[Notari Matsutaro](https://mangadex.org/manga/17288)]* (pg 236)  
	* *TSUNOMARU [Midori no Makibaoh]* (pg 237)  
	* *TOUME Kei [[Sing Yesterday for Me](https://mangadex.org/manga/748)]* (pg 238)  
	* *TOGASHI Yoshihiro [[Hunter x Hunter](https://mangadex.org/manga/939)]* (pg 239)  
	* *TOKUHIRO Masaya [[Jungle King Tar-chan](https://mangadex.org/manga/15810)]* (pg 240)  
	* *TOMISAWA Chinatsu [P Joshiryo no Neko de Aru]* (pg 241)  
	* *NISHI Yoshiyuki [[Muhyo & Roji's Bureau of Supernatural Investigation](https://mangadex.org/manga/9925)]* (pg 242)  
	* *HAGIWARA Kazushi [[Bastard!! Destructive God of Darkness](https://mangadex.org/manga/2275)]* (pg 243)  
	* *HARA Tetsuo [[Fist of the Blue Sky](https://mangadex.org/manga/2110)]* (pg 244)  
	* *HIGUCHI Daisuke [[Whistle!](https://mangadex.org/manga/3744)]* (pg 245)  
	* *HIRAMATSU Shinji [Doberman Deka] [[Black Angels](https://mangadex.org/manga/18450)]* (pg 246)  
	* *FUJII Mihona [[Gals!](https://mangadex.org/manga/5954)]* (pg 247)  
	* *FUJISAKI Ryu [[Houshin Engi](https://mangadex.org/manga/3888)]* (pg 248)  
	* *FUJISHIMA Kosuke [[You're Under Arrest!](https://mangadex.org/manga/11852)]* (pg 249)  
- "Kochikame 30th Anniversary Commemorative Discussion!! Osamu Akimoto x LaSalle Ishii" (pg 250-257)  
- "Kochikame 30th Anniversary Background Staff’s Congratulatory Section" (pg 258-263)

* **Super Collaboration Project #5  
Kochira Katsushikaku Kameari Kouenmae Hashutsujo × Pyu to Fuku! Jaguar × Bobobo-bo Bo-bobo × Taizou Mote King Saga × Maison Du Penguin "Ryoutsu Vs. Don Patch!! JUMP Gag All-Stars’ Great Katsushika Panic!!"**
***by Osamu Akimoto, Kyosuke Usuta, Yoshio Sawai, Amon Dai, & Kouji Ooishi*** (pg 264-273)

- *"Kochikame Characters in Another World ④" (a collection of one-page guest illustrations)*  

	  
	* *HOUJOU Tsukasa [[Angel Heart](https://mangadex.org/manga/363)]* (pg 275)

	* *YAGUCHI Takao [Tsurikichi Sanpei]* (pg 288)  
	* *YASHIRO Masako [Youko Series: Ohagi's Marriage]* (pg 289)

	* *YABUKI Kentarou & HASEMI Saki [[To Love Ru Trouble](https://mangadex.org/manga/732)]* (pg 291)

- "Biida Material: A Visit to Studio Biida!!" (pg 296-301)  
- Ishizuka 2 Yuko’s Assistant Experience Report Manga, "The Akimoto School of Thought” by Ishizuka 2 Yuko (pg 302-305)  
- "Kochikame 30th Anniversary Commemorative Event!! A Long Interview with Osamu Akimoto-sensei" (pg 306-317)  
- "Following the Footsteps of Greatness! Osamu Akimoto's Publishing History" (pg 318-323)  
- "How to use/play the 30th anniversary CD-ROM, Digi-Kame" (pg 324-325)  
- "Kochikame Landmarks" with photography by Mitsugu Oonishi [Reprise] (pg 326-327)

biography.en: Yudetamago (lit. "boiled egg" in Japanese) is the pen name of a mangaka duo consisting of author **Takashi Shimada** and artist **Yoshinori Nakai**. After becoming close friends in elementary school, the two started to get into the world of manga, starting with their most popular work Kinnikuman.

Akira Toriyama (Japanese: 鳥山 明, Hepburn: Toriyama Akira, born April 5, 1955) is a Japanese manga artist and character designer. He first achieved mainstream recognition for his highly successful manga series Dr. Slump, before going on to create Dragon Ball—his best-known work—and acting as a character designer for several popular video games such as the Dragon Quest series, Chrono Trigger and Blue Dragon. Toriyama is regarded as one of the artists that changed the history of manga, as his works are highly influential and popular, particularly Dragon Ball, which many manga artists cite as a source of inspiration.

He earned the 1981 Shogakukan Manga Award for best shōnen or shōjo manga with Dr. Slump, and it went on to sell over 35 million copies in Japan. It was adapted into a successful anime series, with a second anime created in 1997, 13 years after the manga ended. His next series, Dragon Ball, would become one of the most popular and successful manga in the world. Having sold 250–300 million copies worldwide, it is the third best-selling manga of all time and is considered to be one of the main reasons for the period when manga circulation was at its highest in the mid-1980s and mid-1990s. Overseas, Dragon Ball's anime adaptations have been more successful than the manga and are credited with boosting anime's popularity in the Western world. In 2019, Toriyama was decorated a Chevalier of the French Ordre des Arts et des Lettres for his contributions to the arts.

Born: April 5, 1955
Died: March 1, 2024 (age 68 years)

Saito Takao was born on November 3, 1936 in Wakayama, Japan. He died from pancreatic cancer on September 24, 2021.

He was a member of *Gekiga Koubou* (Gekiga Factory), along artists ("gekigaka", *gekiga* authors) such as Tsuge Yoshiharu, Hirata Hiroshi or Koike Kazuo among others.

**Associated names:**
さいとうたかを
SAITO Pro, SAITO Productions
さいとう・プロダクション
